document.full_text: past patterns may point to china, but top investigators say they will never know for sure who mounted a "significant" cyberattack against lockheed martin corp, the pentagon's no. 1 arms supplier.
document.title: analysis: lockheed hack highlights cyber-blame snags
lines_and_colors: past patterns may point to china, but top investigators say they will never know for sure who mounted a "significant" cyberattack against lockheed martin corp, the pentagon's no. 1 arms supplier.
